text.paragraph: Adhikaraṇasamathesu – sattāti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhyāparicchedo. Catubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Tesaṃ vitthāro khandhake ca parivāre ca vutto, tassatthaṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
text.gatha: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medaninti.
